comment: Generalized Heine-Borel Theorem. A metric space is compact iff it is complete and totally bounded. See ~ heibor1 and ~ heiborlem1 for a description of the proof. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jan-2014.)
